snippet.title: LightCube VideoGame Project
snippet.description:
The project was started months ago but finished during the summer =)


This is about a first-person puzzle game in the tradition of science fiction set in the year 2202 in a mysterious monolith. With the help of a weapon you must solve different puzzles and find your way back home. 

You can download the game for free by following the next link: https://subiscript.itch.io/lightcube

I hope you enjoy it!
